format.name: CyrillicGreekChecker
format.description: The argument value must be written entirely in Cyrillic letters. No letters from other scripts are allowed.

fn_schema.name: summarize_news_article
fn_schema.description: Summarizes the content of a news article to capture main points and key information.

article_text.description: The full text of the news article that needs to be summarized. The argument value must be written entirely in Cyrillic letters, and no letters from other scripts are allowed.

summary_length.description: Indicates the desired length of the summary: short, medium, or long.

include_keywords.description: Whether to include key terms and phrases in the summary. Defaults to false.

user_queries: Hi, I just finished reading this news article and would like your help in summarizing it. The article reads: 'Amazon has unveiled plans to build a new distribution center near Dallas, promising to create over 1,200 new jobs. Local government officials are hailing this as a significant boost to the regional economy. Construction is expected to begin this fall, with completion anticipated by late next year. Amazon representatives noted that the facility will prioritize energy efficiency and automation. Some community members expressed concerns about increased traffic and environmental impacts, but city leaders say they are working closely with the company to mitigate any negative effects. Residents hope that job training programs will be offered to ensure local participation in the hiring process.' I'd really appreciate a short summary, and please make sure to include the key terms and phrases used in the article.

Could you provide me with a detailed summary of the following news article? I want a medium-length summary and it’s important that you include the main keywords and key phrases in your reply. Here’s the article: 'The European Union has announced new climate regulations aimed at reducing carbon emissions by 55% before 2030. The regulations propose strict emission targets for industries such as automotive and energy production. Environmental groups praised the plan, while several business leaders warned about increased costs and possible job losses. The EU commission argued that the long-term benefits outweigh short-term challenges. Negotiations are expected to continue over the next several months as member states finalize the legislation.' Thank you!

I have just read a lengthy news article and would love a comprehensive summary that touches on all the crucial points. Please generate a long summary and incorporate important keywords and phrases for greater clarity. Here is the article: 'In a historic move, the United States and China agreed to a joint framework for reducing methane emissions, marking a rare moment of environmental cooperation between the two countries. The agreement, announced at the United Nations Climate Conference, sets out targets for both countries to cut methane output over the next decade. Experts highlight the deal as a significant step towards achieving global climate goals. However, skeptics caution that enforcement remains a challenge given both nations' economic interests. The pact is expected to influence other countries ahead of the G20 summit.'

I'd like your help creating a summary of this recent news article. Please generate a medium-length summary and ensure you include all major keywords and phrases mentioned in the story. Here’s the article: 'SpaceX successfully launched four astronauts to the International Space Station last night in its Crew Dragon spacecraft. The mission, overseen by NASA, marks the company’s third crewed launch this year and reflects deepening public-private partnerships in space exploration. Onboard are two American astronauts, one from the European Space Agency, and a Japanese flight engineer. The launch was delayed due to unfavorable weather but proceeded smoothly once conditions cleared. The crew will spend six months conducting scientific experiments in microgravity.'

Can you read the following article and give me a concise summary, ideally a short one? Also, do include any especially relevant keywords or phrases that appear in the article. This is the article text: 'Pfizer announced today that it will seek emergency use authorization from the FDA for its new COVID-19 vaccine targeting the Omicron variant. Early trial data shows the vaccine is highly effective in preventing severe illness. Health officials are hopeful that a targeted booster shot will help curb rising case counts, particularly as winter approaches. The company expects to distribute doses within weeks pending regulatory approval. Experts say widespread booster adoption could reduce hospitalizations substantially.'
